website_summaries.verdict: A reliable lightweight postal scale that is quick and easy to use.
pros: Weighs continuously as you add items
cons: The maximum weight capacity on this scale is only 35 lbs., which is significantly less than other similarly priced models

customer_reviews.title: First one lasted over 8 years
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this same scale over 8 years ago! One day it just stopped working, so I thought I would upgrade to the 75 lb. one, but it was not as accurate! So I reordered this 35 lb. one which suits my needs just fine. It is just as accurate as my original one, and I hope it will last just as long!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Buy this scale. . .accurate and it lasts.
customer_reviews.text: Previously had purchased 2 cheaper scales on a very well-know auction site for $15 - $20. Neither lasted for more than a few months before having electrical and accuracy issues. This scale is a little more expensive but it is more full featured and considerably more durable. Purchased it in March 2010 and gave it pretty hard use for the first year and a half and normal use since. It still retains its accuracy and no electrical problems like the previous ones. UPDATE 09/18/2017: Scale is still working great and is still very accurate after much use. UPDATE 06/30/2019: Scale is still working great and is still very accurate after much use.
customer_reviews.author: R. Krikorian

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: This thing is garbage. It can’t read anything at all. I put several items of varying weight (hitting zero in between each) and it reads everything as .005 lb.
customer_reviews.author: Dena

customer_reviews.title: Amazing scale for a very low price.
customer_reviews.text: I'd give this 6 stars. Love this little scale. Used it about 90 times to mail off E-Bay packages. Accurate (I'd always add one tenth of an ounce to it just to be sure). Like how it remembers your last choice of pounds/ounces/ etc. Make sure, when you first turn it on, that you don't put anything on the scale until it has settled-out or it will give you an error.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: lightweight and easy to move
customer_reviews.text: I've had this scale at least 2 years and use it constantly. I have a very large Ebay business and ship many packages 6 days a week. It is very accurate, lightweight and easy to move, which I do sometimes. I love the scale and am going to buy another so I have a back-up. I highly recommend it to anyone that needs a postal scale.
customer_reviews.author: carmurr

customer_reviews.title: Works better than expected so far
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical after reading several reviews of low cost scales. I just wanted something for occasional packages without having to run to the PO to find out how much shipping would be. I initially tested it with my wife's work-out 1-2-3-5 lb barbells and they were all over the stated weight by a few ounces. Then weighed packages to be sent by USPO and Fed-X. The one at the post office weighed exactly the same to the .1 oz and the Fed-x differed by 1 oz (the clerk may have rounded). So far it seems that it will be accurate enough for my purposes but time will tell. I'll try to update this review after more useage.
customer_reviews.author: Joe DIY

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't work at all
customer_reviews.text: If the point if this scale was to turn on and do absolutely nothing once you put something on it then it works perfect. Waste of time and money
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic and lasts longer than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Picked this scale up on a whim. The price is exceptional for the quality and longevity of the scale. I've even expanded its range of useful functions from weighing packages to measuring ingredients for the kitchen. The scale is accurate, durable, and I have yet to experience an issue with it in about a year and a half of ownership. The ability to measure in various units as well as the hold function that allows you to weigh items that would normally block the screen have proved invaluable time and time again. I hope to get many more years out of this scale - and don't think that's at all out of the question.
customer_reviews.author: Heiligerdankgesang

customer_reviews.title: Great little postal (and small animal) scale
customer_reviews.text: Reviews of other scales by the same manufacturer concerned me, but the ones for this size scale were positive so took a chance. So far, the scale works great and is pretty accurate. We use it to determine if we need additional postage on envelopes and to determine if priority or flat rate is more economical for packages. We also discovered (by accident) that our kitty will tolerate being weighed on the scale...especially if we leave it out and allow her to make the decision when to get on the scale. This helped us accurately weigh her to purchase the correct dose of flea medicine.
customer_reviews.author: JoTop Contributor: Fashion Design

customer_reviews.title: Nice scale for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I usually read the reviews before I order and there were enough complaints about the digital postal scales that I almost did not order even this one...which had generally good reviews. Glad I ordered it. It works perfectly and is very accurate. I checked it against the Post Office scale on two packages which showed the same weight. I have started using it for weighing lots of things. Tonight I weighed 11 ounces of watermelon for a snack since I count carbs.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great value especially for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I had my old scale for maybe 20 years and was saddened when it finally hit the dust. I never thought there could be a scale that I liked as much as the one I had. Okay, now that I have this scale I feel like I have gone from horse and buggy to a race car in one fell swoop. This scale is light weight, doesn't take up much room and is remarkably accurate. My husband does some craft work and needs very precise weights for the work he does and he's been delighted with the accuracy and ease of this scale. I'm a happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: denise

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Scale
customer_reviews.text: This scale really works well for us. It is much better than name-brand more costly scales sold by big-box office supply stores. The LW scale allows you to perform a calibration, but it has measured correctly (per calibration weights) for over two years now. You can use the included AC-to-DC power supply instead of batteries (so you don't have to worry about batteries corroding). This was a great find.
customer_reviews.author: UTA

customer_reviews.title: nice scale at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with this portable scale. It is accurate, easy to use, and has a couple of nice features not found on some similar scales. I love the larger than average platform. I am using it to weigh light-weight but bulky items, so the larger platform is a real bonus. The 'hold' feature that allows me to see the weight after I remove items from the scale is also helpful when dealing with bulky items that may obstruct viewing the display. The display is nice and bright and large enough to be easy to read. I also really appreciate having the option of powering it with batteries or electricity using the ac adapter that comes with it.
customer_reviews.author: Wunder

customer_reviews.title: Solid Construction
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and the finish, it is accurate and easy to use. I would definitely recommend this scale.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth M

customer_reviews.title: Awesome scale!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was using a food scale to weigh my packages for the past year. Although it was accurate without problem, this one makes it look like I was using a stone age device. I have mine running on batteries, but it has a plug for a wall connection if you don't want to use batteries. The unit is compact enough to not be in my way when it is sitting on my desk while the top tray is large enough to support very big packages for weighing. This unit displays weight in grams, kilograms, pounds, ounces, or my favorite, pounds and ounces.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Hagerty

customer_reviews.title: Good scale. It weighs well
customer_reviews.text: Good scale. It weighs well. We ship packages from 1 oz to 30lbs and it has been right on as far as UPS is concerned. It does have a problem with the on off switch not working. Once it is plugged up it just stays on and the power switch just makes it do a power on reset. But it works well. Probably another one does not have this problem. I would buy another even knowing about this.
customer_reviews.author: T. G. Hails

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I've had this scale for over almost 2 years. It sees daily use with several packages each day and so far has done what it is advertised to do. Very reliable. The only think I think could be improved is that it won't hold a measurement for light packages. I ship some very light but larger packages and it makes it difficult to see the weight. I typically put something tall/small and zero out, then set the real package on top to work around this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah S. Bayless

customer_reviews.title: used for whelping puppies and tracking weight gain
customer_reviews.text: bought this scale to weight puppies as they were whelped. Also used to keep track of weight progress. This scale is very well made. the last one i bought I returned because it felt cheap and not well put together. This scale is a solid built and functions consistently. I weighed puppies several times a piece to ensure accuracy and the scale gave me exact readings each time. Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jaime G M

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice scale. I use it for ebay sales and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice scale. I use it for ebay sales and haven't needed a scale over 35 pounds yet. Easy to use and has a simple design. The top flips up for envelopes.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal M.

customer_reviews.title: FAIL
customer_reviews.text: Just recieved product. Weighing an 8 lb item after zeroing I could not get the same measurement twice and weight varied by as much as a pound. Without anything on scale it would fluxuaaste off zero +/- a few ounces. Highly inaccurate and inconsistent. Back in box to retuen within an hour after recieving. I get better accuracy off my bath scale.
customer_reviews.author: Slightly Caffeinated

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I am using this product in a science project at the local middle school the children are to design and build a tower of balsa and spruce wood which in about two feet tall which can carry many times its own weight. the maximum load is 15 kilograms and a typical winning tower weigh about 10 grams ( the winning towers carry 1500 times their own weight) the towers are placed on the postal scale and a vertical force is applied to the top of the tower increasing until failure or until the 15 kg limit is reached,, the scale is easy to use and easy to read thank you for this very useful product
customer_reviews.author: Roland A. Boucher

customer_reviews.title: Great scale
customer_reviews.text: This is a great scale and does everything I need it to do. Love the fact that I can override the auto shut off so that the scale doesn't shut off while I am in the middle of weighing something....like the cheap scales often do. In addition, there is an AC adapter so the scale does not require an endless supply of batteries (which gets expensive). The vendor shipped quickly and I was ready to start my projects immediately out of the box. Very happy with my purchase. This scale is a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: suznie

customer_reviews.title: weight wonder.
customer_reviews.text: this little guy is magical! works perfectly with batteries or plugged in. very important if you ship a lot.
customer_reviews.author: A Simone

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little work horse.
customer_reviews.text: I already had three scales in our shipping room (one is built into the postage meter). This is the one that now gets used the most. Its like the three bears and you know. . . This one seems to be just the right size. I have to admit that sometimes it will differ from the PitneyBowes meter's scale by a tenth of an ounce, but I don't know which one is correct. I highly recommend this scale.
customer_reviews.author: calendarboy

customer_reviews.title: very sensitive
customer_reviews.text: I reviewed a number of these postal scales and chose this one even though there were a few negative things that bothered me in a number of other reviews. I have experienced none of the suggested problems, and it seems quite accurate and easy to use. It seems to be flawless at very light weights, and now my wife (who seems to want to put two stamps on every letter with more than one page) can feel comfortable with the postage we put on things.
customer_reviews.author: James F. Kadlec

customer_reviews.title: It does more than is advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived early, packed well, works great, easy to use, good features, worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be careful what you are using this for
customer_reviews.text: Serves my purpose. Has worked fine plugged in. I haven't tried using it on battery power yet. Not a good fit if you are using in primarily for grams setting. I bought this to get the exact weight of gold jewelry for resale purposes. Found that a +/- 2 gram difference means a lot in this area. I have changed and now use it to weigh packages for postage and it works great for this
customer_reviews.author: B. Pittman

customer_reviews.title: Great scales but beware
customer_reviews.text: I'll start with the good stuff. I LOVE using these scales and do so on a daily basis. They are easy to operate, seemingly accurate, consistent and very cheap. Things were going very well, and I was ready to write a glowing review, then they stopped working. This was after one or two month's use. I contacted the manufacturer direct and they issued a replacement immediately, with no questions asked. The speed with which they complied suggests this has been a common problem. Not sure whether it's a product defect or they produced a 'bad batch'. Fantastic customer service nevertheless. We now have our new set of scales and all is well...fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: Grady Seasons

customer_reviews.title: Digital Postal Scale
customer_reviews.text: I sell on ebay and was having trouble finding a postal scale locally that would weigh heavier items,like coats......I bought this scale from EZ sell on Amazon and couldn't be happier....In the 3 weeks i have owned it, my USPS has not once disputed the accuracy of my postage.....Now I can list my items with confidence,knowing that i have correctly calculated the shipping charges.....The scale is so easy to use and the digital read-out is bright and clear!.....I love my new scale!.....It has made my little business run so much smoother!...........Thanks, EZ sell!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Jo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use , read, and accurate
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my business needed weight to be exactly 1 lb. have used it for other things too works great. It has made things way easier. I like that it plugs into an outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect
customer_reviews.text: I recently started selling on ebay.I had NO idea what I was doing when it came to shipping. The first sales I made I went right to the post office. It was such a mess... and I cost me $22 to ship 3 items. So I came home and bought this. It has saved me so much money. Now I can weigh stuff before I list it to make sure I'm not losing money. I have used this scale 20+ times and it has yet to be wrong. Great buy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Con

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to measure pinewood derby cars. It works perfectly. Swapping from oz to g is simple push of button. Has the button that allows me to put on a cup (so I can drop in little things like axels and wheels without rolling off scale) and reset it back to zero to not count the weight of the cup. Nice that I can plug it in and not have to rely on batteries, but it also takes batteries. Seems to be nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: steven berzins

customer_reviews.title: Quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome scale. The controls are easy to use, it feels durable enough for home use. It's very accurate. I finally get to ebay my other food scale. This new one handles much heavier weights and perhaps best of all it uses real honest to goodness AA batteries (or the included adapter) instead of expensive button style batteries in my old scale that don't last and can't be recharged. So this scale will eventually pay for itself over my current one.
customer_reviews.author: C M

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and easy to use. Was ready to go out the box. Just what I needed
customer_reviews.author: renee armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Compact but easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: I keep it in my drawer and pull it out when I need it. Haven't tested it against anything that I know the exact weight to know about its accuracy. Read good reviews on that category though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works like it's advertised
customer_reviews.text: Set up was easy, it's accurate and much more economical than getting a postage machine as our business doesn't warrant something more elaborate. Easy to read the display and simple enough to use. This machine show weight only so If you make a print out of a weight/postage$ reference card and put next to the machine you're all set to go.
customer_reviews.author: WaSUP808

customer_reviews.title: Gave 2 stars instead of 1 because we were able to return easily without
customer_reviews.text: Scale weighed lighter packages (under 1 lb) incorrectly 3 out of 4 times....not reliable at all. Gave 2 stars instead of 1 because we were able to return easily without issue
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer in MD

customer_reviews.title: So far so great!!!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a digital postal scale mainly for shipping items but also for general tasks around the shop, like mixing epoxy by weight. I read reviews and looked for the best bang for the buck. I really think this is it. For the price range that this falls in, it is a larger than average unit. It makes it much easier to see the display when you put a large item on it. It runs off batteries or A/C adapter. It has a backlit display with hold function. It displays the weight in numerous units. I just really can't imagine a better deal for a standard digital scale. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M Moss

customer_reviews.title: The backlit LED no longer works but honestly that's ok It gives great accurate weight measurements
customer_reviews.text: After over 2 years of use my unit is still going. It says "hello" on startup and "bye" when you turn it off which is addorable. The backlit LED no longer works but honestly that's ok It gives great accurate weight measurements.
customer_reviews.author: K. Stoyanov

customer_reviews.title: Weigh it right
customer_reviews.text: This scale is very nice.Its platform is larger than most I have seen in this catagory.You can weigh g,lb.oz.,kg,lb. & oz. The lid folds up if needed to secure a position for the item being weighed. it has a 35lb. weight compacity. You can use batteries or the ac adapter that is provided. I would recomend this scale if you do a lot of shipping & need it to be accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Shad

customer_reviews.title: Worked for two months, then died.
customer_reviews.text: Title says it all. I use this for my EBay business, which is PART-TIME, averaging about twenty listings a month max, so this wasn't used and abused. This morning I went to weigh my first item to get a shipping estimate, and --- POOF! --- nothing. Now I'm hamstrung until I can get another scale. And it won't be another one of these!
customer_reviews.author: J. Meuse

customer_reviews.title: Digital Postal Scale
customer_reviews.text: This was a very nice purchase. I checked the accuracy at the post office and this scale is right on. The directions are easy to use and you can recalibrate the scales. Very impressive scale. The last one I had wasn't accurate and cost me $$$$$ for extra postage after the fact.The light up reading is great and easy to read. You won't be disappointed with this scale.
customer_reviews.author: L. Rose

customer_reviews.title: No more trips to the post office
customer_reviews.text: I have an online business and frequently ship large items. You can get better prices on shipping online through paypal, so this has come in handy instead of driving to the post office with the large item, having them weigh it, and then bringing it back home to print a label because it is cheaper to ship that way. This seems to be a durable scale.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolette J. Blount

customer_reviews.title: Great Scale!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a larger postal scale, as my old one (which was the US Postal Service brand), only weighed up to 10 pounds. Well, I was a little worried that this scale might not be accurate, but when I compared it to the postal service scale, it was right on the money! Easy to use, and so far after many months of use, It is still working great!
customer_reviews.author: D.

customer_reviews.title: Good unit
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this 4 or 5 times and it has worked perfectly. The digital scale goes to 35# but I haven't weighed anything that heavy. I have no doubt that it will work fine at the high end. One thing that I really like is that it can be used without batteries. Just plug it in. That's handy for infrequent users where batteries would self discharge between uses. It was fairly priced. `I'd buy it again and will always check Amazon first. Their support and service are first class.
customer_reviews.author: Filmer

customer_reviews.title: Great scale
customer_reviews.text: So far the scale is doing the job I bought it for. The adapter is a real plus. I like the fact that the readout is on the front facing you. It is easier to read when the surface is covered with an item being weighed and there is a backlight which is very useful and makes it easy to read. I would recommend this scale.
customer_reviews.author: J. French

customer_reviews.title: Great so far!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this scale twice a week for the last month, weighing items for self printed postage. Has been quick and accurate every time. I’m very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: AJL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I think it's already paid for itself with the money I've saved in postage. I can weigh my packages and purchase postage through USPS at a discount and get free tracking. It also works great sending things sold on eBay. I was skeptical about the quality for this price, but was pleasantly surprised! No complaints, it works great and saves me time and money!
customer_reviews.author: Snowtoboggan

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: While I am not qualified to comment on the true accuracy of this scale, I find that its measurements are very repeatable. I'm not aware of anything that can come close in this price range. I like the option for display in multiple units, but I always run mine in grams due to the higher "readability" (precision).
customer_reviews.author: A. Gift For You

customer_reviews.title: Seems accurate, good for my at-home business
customer_reviews.text: I like this scale. I have a small at-home business that involves shipping items out from home and buying shipping online. I feel this scale is accurate and seems well made. Simple and easy to use. Will save you a lot of time not having to stand in line at the post office!
customer_reviews.author: Mark W.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased w/this digital scale
customer_reviews.text: I also purchased this scale based on reviews I read from other users. I'm new at selling on eBay and needed something reasonably priced that worked well, and handled more weight than the standard USPS 10LB scale. I've only used it a few times so far, but am very pleased. The weights are accurate every time we weigh items (over & over), the readout is clear and key funtions easy to use. It's a nice compact scale, and doesn't take up much space either. Thanks to all who pointed out that this scale comes with an AC Adapter, whereas many others do not - that's not something I would have thought to check.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Solid scale
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, solid and accurate. I like how you can plug it in, you don't have to use batteries. I also like how this scale has different ranges, it can function as a scale for light items or for heavier. My last postage scale had a max weight of five pounds, so this is significant. If you need one scale, this would be the one IMO. As cheap as the cooking ones from Walmart but more flexible and bigger.
customer_reviews.author: clearanceman

customer_reviews.title: Digital Postal Scale
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift to a friend who ships his violin CDs on a regular basis. He reports that it is a wonderful scale, is easy to operate, is not bulky, and will save him a lot of time at the post-office by knowing the cost of shipping before hand. Based on his comments, I might consider purchasing one for my own home.
customer_reviews.author: smalldeb

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: This item is perfect for the typical home user who ships eBay items, Christmas packages, etc. Easy to use. The large platform and 35 lb. capacity makes it usable for all but the heaviest shipments. I can't vouch for its accuracy down the fractions of an ounce, or how it would hold up to high volume commercial use, but for me its just great.
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: Terrific performance - accurate to a tenth of an ounce
customer_reviews.text: I've had this scale for almost 5 years. Terrific performance - accurate to a tenth of an ounce. Gives same measurements as USPS' counter scale.
customer_reviews.author: Ducmeister

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: I am generally very happy with this product and have no complaints. I purchased it to help me calculate more accurate shipping for my online vintage jewelry business, and it has been very accurate. The one slight annoyance I have is the tendency of the scale to shut off sometimes while I'm in the middle of weighing something. Using the hold button helps and it's not a big deal to just turn it back on. It does what I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Beltran

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice scale, easy to use and easy to switch from oz to lbs. Large 7" x 8.5" top surface. Power port has 12 VDC printed on it, but the manual and adapter are 9 VDC. One wierdness is that when I weighed a 5 oz item and switched the scale to "lb" it displayed 3 lbs. The "lb:oz" reading was correct.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent scale. Display washes out when viewed on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent scale. Display washes out when viewed on the plane of the base, making it difficult to read when weighing bulky packages. Does have a hold feature that activates automatically (sometimes?) and can be used to read the weight when the package is removed.
customer_reviews.author: helluvaengineer

customer_reviews.title: Once and a great while it gets a little glitchy
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for over 2 years now for eBay sales and for the price you cannot beat it. Once and a great while it gets a little glitchy, but I do keep it in cold garage office so I can't really blame the unit. A quick reset and it is back to business. Highly recommended for anyone looking for a cheap reliable unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for my new foray into the world of eBay selling
customer_reviews.text: I am a stay at home Mum trying to earn a few dollars to contribute to the household finances and eBay is a great way for me to do so. I was getting confused about guessing weights and spending too much time at the Post office, so I decided to order some postal scales. These were a great price, seem to accurate and are also can take a heavier weight than a lot of the ones out there. Also as I have Amazon Prime membership, they shipped for FREE!
customer_reviews.author: K. Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Great use.
customer_reviews.text: A relatively simple scale to use. Serves my needs as I ship out mostly small packages, the ability to change the unit measurement is a nice plus. If you ship small packages, than this a product you should look into.
customer_reviews.author: BomberMusicInc.

customer_reviews.title: Scale
customer_reviews.text: Works great and exactly what I needed for my business. this is I think, the fourth scale that I have had to buy over the years of my on line business selling sewing patterns at Moonwishes Sewing and Crafts. I'm hoping it will last a lot longer than the other ones!
customer_reviews.author: Moonwishes (AKA Gail Rodgers)

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for selling online
customer_reviews.text: This scale is essential to selling online and I recommend it without reservation to anyone who is considering doing so. I would buy another one immediately if something happened to it. It precisely weighs anything I put on it. If I could give it more than five stars I would.
customer_reviews.author: Curious Ginny

customer_reviews.title: Exact measurement
customer_reviews.text: This affordable scale is a great help to measuring projectiles for delivery. Measuring them are way better than counting them individually. Saves a huge amount of time. Have it for two months and it continues to perform admirably. A great measuring device you can trust. Highly recommended for home use.
customer_reviews.author: Rott boy

customer_reviews.title: Worked great...for a little while
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this scale and lightly used it to weigh items less than 20 lbs in weight. It worked wonderfully for about a month (used it a dozen times in a month) and suddenly it stopped working while plugged into the wall. I tried different outlets inside the house, wiggled the cord connections on the plug and wire with no success. I thought I'd try the battery power method. It worked! For one use, now I can't even get the unit to power up with either batteries or wall connection. I'm hoping the seller can work with me to either give me a replacement or refund my money. Buyer be cautious.
customer_reviews.author: 18a19

customer_reviews.title: The perfect scale at the perfect price!
customer_reviews.text: We use this everyday. This little scale is a work horse. Very accurate and incredibly easy to use. If you need a small office scale this really is an amazing value. We HIGHLY recommend this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer Helper

customer_reviews.title: This scale works great and is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This scale works great and is easy to use. I use it for weighing food for my Boy Scout backpack trips so I can ensure everybody carries their share of the food. This scale really makes it easy.
customer_reviews.author: William S. Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Digital Postal Scale
customer_reviews.text: The digital postal scales are light weight, small, neat and very simple to use. We actually used them to weigh fish at a local fishing tournament for children. They were very accurate. I am quite sure that we will find many uses for them other than the intended use.......postage! We give them an A+ !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Diane H. Hinkle

customer_reviews.title: Accurate, simple to use
customer_reviews.text: Very good scale. Accurate within a tenth of an ounce. Used daily, 30-40 per day. No complaints so far. As long as the scale continues operating, I'd say its the best scale we've owned to date. Pros: -Back light -Accuracy -Price Cons: - None so far
customer_reviews.author: Cycle Fudge

customer_reviews.title: Great Scale
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery and high quality scale. I have another digital scale and the two match perfectly. I'm hoping this one lasts a long time. The weighing surface is large enough to weigh most large packages. I always use the battery adapter, so I don't really know how long batteries would last.
customer_reviews.author: D. L R

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I now own two of these. I've used my first one now for at least 2 years and am still on the original batteries. You just can't beat them for the money. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: LexusSam

customer_reviews.title: Great postage scale!
customer_reviews.text: Love this scale! It’s been accurate and very easy to use. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kerbe

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use and a great price.
customer_reviews.text: The title says it all. I've had no problems with the scale in the almost two years I've been using it. Since it sits on the desk in our home office, I wish it were a more attractive color. But, I knew the color when I bought it. So, I'm not going to knock any stars off for that. It's just a note.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: and this was a great deal for scale
customer_reviews.text: It's a couple 10ths off compared to my other scale. I don't know which one is right. You get what you pay for, and this was a great deal for scale, considering you can get an official one for $200. A 10th of an ounce off is okay with me.
customer_reviews.author: amaquin

customer_reviews.title: Accurate & Fast
customer_reviews.text: I am tempted to give this 4 stars because the Hold feature is inconsistent and bothersome. However, the scale is repeatable and fast. It's just annoying to have it lock up on Hold only because I don't keep up with it's time out cycle.
customer_reviews.author: pines

customer_reviews.title: Great Postal Scale
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely perfect! I weigh the mail and put the appropriate postage on the envelope/package. When I get to the post office with it, the postal staff weigh it again and this scale is right on target! Easy to use and accurate - what more could you ask?
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Blue Reflection

customer_reviews.title: Great scale and convenient features!
customer_reviews.text: So far, this scale has been great! It is usually within a few ounces of the post office scale with my boxes. I don't mail too many small items but from the occassional use at home for various small items, it appears to be accurate. The hold button is very helpful for large items and being able to set it to zero with an item on the scale and then adding to it is a great feature! I am not sure if it can be calibrated but I don't have accurate weights anyway, so, for the money and the convenience, I am very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: weninfw

customer_reviews.title: How can it cost so little?
customer_reviews.text: Previously, I bought a dial postal scale at a big box store for only $6 less. In contrast the Tree SPS is accurate, easy to use and low priced. Digital display is easy to read. Can operate with 6 AA batteries or AC. Online description is accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Buzz

customer_reviews.title: No need to buy weights
customer_reviews.text: I like this scale as it has no need to calibrate it with weights. Who wants to buy a modern scale that you must calibrate. Setup was fast. Well packages with very little waste. Plugged it in and had our first package ready to go in less than five minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Walkingbird

customer_reviews.title: Great postage scale
customer_reviews.text: Great postage scale! I recommend this product to anyone that sends out bulky mail/packages and wants to save trips to the post office. Accurate readings. Nice compact design for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: Fangy

customer_reviews.title: Great little scale.
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes I am flat out amazed at what you can buy for $20 bucks these days. I sell fertile hatching eggs on eBay and use this scale to weigh my packages to print out my mailing labels. It works great. Last week I weighed all my chickens on it too.
customer_reviews.author: Safari Man

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly accurate! Has made my life soooo much easier ...
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly accurate! Has made my life soooo much easier to ship things, especially that I can flip the lid for bulkier items I want to weigh!!! This has been a lifesaver...no more trips to the post-office to weight before I ship!
customer_reviews.author: Fair Play

customer_reviews.title: Very nice scale.
customer_reviews.text: Very accurate and easy to use. The screen is easy to read and the different measurement units are very helpful. It also is very friendly and says "hello" when you turn it on and "bye" when you turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Postal Shipping Scale for my business!
customer_reviews.text: I received this postage scale a few months ago and after using it all I can say is that I love it. The scale is accurate and very easy to use. I send out a lot packages and it was essential to have a scale that was accurate and could weigh both small and large packages. I would highly recommend this scale to anyone that has a micro business that has to send out packages daily.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Anne's

customer_reviews.title: Great Scale
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I use it every day. Works perfectly. One added perc is that it runs on batteries as well as electric and the batteries last a long time. That allows me to carry it to where the heavy stuff is rather than the other way round.
customer_reviews.author: VoodooDali

customer_reviews.title: so far, so good
customer_reviews.text: given the prices i've seen for scales of much less capacity, i was pretty skeptical of this item. the first thing i did when i got it was to use some small check weights i happen to have- it was dead on. i've used it to mail about a dozen items of various weights so far, and the post office has agreed with each one. i think the only unknown with this scale is how long it will last. right now i'd have to say this is a great scale at a bargain price.
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Excellent scale
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is an excellent scale. The readout is easy to decipher and rapidly levels once an item is placed on the scale. I'm the testing coordinator for a high school and we're handling over 8000 test books and 2,200 answer documents. Weighing the materials rather than counting has greatly improved our efficiency and sped the check out/check in time for teachers. I like that it operates by plug or batteries. It also has a myriad of different weight measurement options. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: dadmin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is GREAT - perfectly accurate with tested objects from a fraction of an ounce to grams and pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Hendershott

customer_reviews.title: It's nice when something just works like it should
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what you expect it would. This is my second "tree" scale, the other being a counting scale and they are well made and well thought out.
customer_reviews.author: Power Squirrel

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool for A Home Office
customer_reviews.text: I sell allot on eBay. I cant live without this scale. It works every time. Seems to be accurate as I have never had the post office return anything for additional postage!
customer_reviews.author: Yorkstermom

customer_reviews.title: ... that my weight is off so it must work good.
customer_reviews.text: Been using this postage scale for quite awhile and never have had the post office complain that my weight is off so it must work good.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: perfect accurate scale
customer_reviews.text: love the digital scale.....it is so accuarte and i used it now for almost 9 months....i compared it to the post office one and was right on.........very simple to use and can put big items on it. the scale i bought goes up to 35lbs.......it is perfect for me...
customer_reviews.author: busylady

customer_reviews.title: works like a charm.
customer_reviews.text: We needed a new scale and didn't want to spend a large amount of money. This one fits the bill just fine. Resaonable price, not too large, weighs up to 35#. weighs both metric and English. Seems to be very sensitive and weighs .1oz. Supplier shipped on time.
customer_reviews.author: Waynerider

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and durable
customer_reviews.text: I use this scale in plastics manufacturing and I need to mix chemicals precisely by weight. This scale is dead on and easy to use. It has a solid and durable construction. Best buy for the price, hands down.
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great scale for the price, I use it for lots of stuff.
customer_reviews.author: airtight_python

customer_reviews.title: Good scale - very precise
customer_reviews.text: I had this scale for a week and I like it a lot! This is why: Big display with back light, very easy to see measurements. Good size and very sturdy built - should last for a long time. Measurements are very precise, doesn't matter where you put your item on the scale, it gives the same reading all the time. Uses AA batteries, rather than 9v (comes with adapter, but I don't use it). I would definitely recommend this scale for any eBay seller.
customer_reviews.author: V. Petrulevich

customer_reviews.title: So far it's perfect
customer_reviews.text: This scale is perfect for my small business - I especially like the "hold" button that keeps the weight while I remove the package to get the total. I've used it about 10 times so far and I am very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I read the previous reviews and felt confident in ordering this product. I was not disappointed. Serves my needs as a small business shipper, and I love the HOLD feature that allows you to place a large package on the scale, and see the weight after it is removed. Don't hesitate to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Suzan L. Paisley

customer_reviews.title: A GOOD BUY
customer_reviews.text: I am an Information Director for a railroad historical society and weekly submit mailings. The scale so far, has been right on the money when weighing the mail. With various denominations of stamps in the office and weighing the mailings individually, I save a two mile drive to the post office to weigh the items as well as postage savings when sometimes trying to estimate the mailing cost. A good product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Meckstroth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I started selling on Ebay and other websites and I needed a scale, this one works perfectly, it's small enough that it doesn't take up a huge amount of space. I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: SD

product_meta.title: Digital Postal Shipping Postage Bench Scales 35 lbs
product_meta.description: Small postal scale is a great economical way to calculate the weight of packages that need to be shipped for your small business. With a 21 bit A/D processor and an update speed of 7.5Hz this is a great deal.
feature_bullets: Auto backlight, shut off and hold all selectable and available on this model
Capacity 35lb x 0.1oz with the following available units: kg, g, lb, oz, lb: oz
2mil internal resolutions, 3200 display divisions, 4 keys, large platter 8.5 x 7 Inches
Any Call software makes for easy re-calibration if needed

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars446 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
